document_data.name: Darsson's Notes
document_data.author: [[Darsson Spellmaker]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Darsson's Notes''''' was the research tome of the famous [[Halruaan (ethnicity)|Halruaan]] [[mage]] known as [[Darsson Spellmaker]]. It contained his personal notes on the history of [[magic]], specifications of [[spell]]s of his creation and research on [[Item enchantment|magical items]] attributed to him as well.
document_data.Description: Darsson's book was {{SI|1|ft|c}} tall, {{SI|8|in|c}} wide and about {{SI|1|in|c}} thick, bound in fine leather. It had 150 pages, about half of which were full of his notes, commentary and directions.
document_data.Contents:
''Darsson's Notes'' contained descriptions and the details of both the ''[[ring of magic detection]]'' and ''[[wand of portraiture]]''.

It also contained information on the following spells: 
:''[[Amplify]]'' • ''[[Distort]]'' • ''[[Know school]]'' • ''[[Darsson's cooling breeze]]'' (unique) • ''[[Darsson's fiery cube]]'' (unique) • ''[[Portrait]]'' • ''[[Safety net]]'' • ''[[Lessen gravity]]'' • ''[[Darsson's eye in the sky]]'' (unique) • ''[[Darsson's potion]]'' (unique) • ''[[Darsson's music box]]'' (unique) • ''[[Summon Darsson]]'' (unique) • ''[[Suspension]]''
